com.percussion.xmldom
Class PSXmlDomUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.xmldom.PSXmlDomUtils

public class PSXmlDomUtils
extends Object

A set of utility routines for the XML document processing extensions. All of these utils are static methods designed for use only within the com.percussion.xmldom package.

Field Summary

          The encoding for all "debugging" files

Method Detail

loadXmlDocument

public static Document loadXmlDocument(PSXmlDomContext cx,
                                       File incomingFile)
                                throws IOException,
                                       Exception
Load the XML document from a File. The file optionally run through Tidy to clean up all of the non-XML compliant structures and then ServerPageTags to remove other non-essential "junk" added by certain applications (e.g. Word 2000)

Parameters:
cx - the PSXmlDomContext for this request.
incomingFile - The file which contains the XML/HTML document.
Returns:
the parsed Document as an XML tree; may be null or empty.
Throws:
IOException
Exception

loadXmlDocument

public static Document loadXmlDocument(PSXmlDomContext cx,
                                       File incomingFile,
                                       String encoding)
                                throws IOException,
                                       Exception
Load the XML document from a File. The file is optionally run through Tidy to clean up all of the non-XML compliant structures, and then ServerPageTags to remove other non-essential "junk" added by certain applications (e.g. Word 2000)

Parameters:
cx - the PSXmlDomContext for this request.
incomingFile - The file which contains the XML/HTML document.
encoding - the character encoding to use
Returns:
the parsed Document as an XML tree.
Throws:
IOException
Exception

loadXmlDocument

public static Document loadXmlDocument(PSXmlDomContext cx,
                                       String HTMLString)
                                throws FileNotFoundException,
                                       IOException,
                                       UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                       Exception
Parses an XML Document from the given String. Depending on the settings in the supplied context, the String will first be run through Tidy and server page tags processing. The context also determines if a validating or non-validating parser will be used.

Parameters:
cx - the PSXmlDomContext for this request; cannot be null
HTMLString - the source HTML or XML document as a String; may be null or empty.
Returns:
the parsed org.w3c.dom.Document. Will be null if the source string is empty.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
IOException
UnsupportedEncodingException
Exception

tidyInput

public static String tidyInput(PSXmlDomContext cx,
                               String htmlInput)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               IOException,
                               UnsupportedEncodingException,
                               PSExtensionProcessingException
Tidy the incoming document, based on the settings in the operation context.

Parameters:
cx - the PSXmlDomContext for this request, must not be null.
htmlInput - a String containing the input to be tidied, if blank returns empty string.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
IOException
UnsupportedEncodingException
PSExtensionProcessingException

addResultNode

protected static void addResultNode(PSXmlDomContext cx,
                                    Document resultDoc,
                                    String nodeName,
                                    String nodeValue)
                             throws Exception
Put a string into the result document, at a particular node location, which can be a compound name: category/nodelevel1/nodelevel2.

Parameters:
cx - @see(PSXmlDomContext) for the current request
resultDoc - the DOM document where the node is to be added
nodeName - the name of the node to add under the root document. This name may be a compound name (e.g. category/nodevalue)
nodeValue - the string value to add
Throws:
Exception

replaceText

public static Element replaceText(Document parentDoc,
                                  Element elementNode,
                                  String newValue)
Replace all of the TEXT nodes underneath a given element with a single new text node. If the node has markup, it may not be preserved. Comments, CDATA sections, and other children of the node are not changed.

Parameters:
parentDoc - the document that the element belongs to
elementNode - the element to be replaced
newValue - the string which contains the new value
Returns:
the original Element.

readInFile

protected static String readInFile(File inFile,
                                   String encoding)
                            throws FileNotFoundException,
                                   UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                   IOException
Read a file into a string, in chunks.

Parameters:
inFile - The incoming file
encoding - The standard Java name for the file's encoding method
Returns:
The file as a String, never null
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
UnsupportedEncodingException
IOException

readInFile

protected static String readInFile(File inFile)
                            throws FileNotFoundException,
                                   UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                   IOException
Read a file into a String, in chunks, using the default encoding.

Parameters:
inFile - the incoming file
Returns:
The file as a String, never null
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
UnsupportedEncodingException
IOException

findElement

public static Element findElement(String elementName,
                                  Document doc)
Gets the element from the specified documement that matches the specified name.

Parameters:
elementName - name of an element within the specified document, or "." to match the root element; cannot be null or empty
doc - document to search; cannot be null
Returns:
Element within doc that matches elementName , or null if no matching element was found

getParameter

protected static String getParameter(Object[] params,
                                     int pindex,
                                     String defValue)
Get a parameter from the parameter list, and return it as a trimmed string. This is a utility function intended for the com.percussion.xmldom extensions.

Parameters:
params - array of parameter objects from the calling function.
pindex - the integer index into the parameters
defValue - the default value of the parameter (may be null)
Returns:
If index'ed parameter exits, it is trimed and return. If that parameter is not provided, then defValue is returned.

getParameter

protected static Object getParameter(Object[] params,
                                     int pindex)
Get a parameter from the parameter list, and return it as an Object. The object will retain its original class type. This is a utility function intended for the com.percussion.xmldom extensions.

Parameters:
params - array of parameter objects from the calling function.
pindex - the integer index into the parameters
Returns:
the parameter as a object, unless the parameter is not present, in which case the return value is null
